Dated: - 21/01/2014   
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.: 02 /2014 
 
Subject: Extension of the facility to Dr. Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for 
Cultural Relations, for access up to the tarmac in his own vehicle during his 
departure/arrival by air at all airports.  
 
 
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. - 08/2013 dated 04/07/2013 on the 
subject cited above.  
 
   
The permission to Dr. Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for Cultural 
Relations is hereby extended, on medical grounds, to take his own vehicle up to the 
tarmac during his departure/arrival by air at all airports in the country for a further 
period of six months upto 30/06/2014. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation). 
 
 
 
 
 
 (R.N. Dhoke, IPS)  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached / overleaf. 
 
Copy to: 
 
MCA (Shri S.V. Ramana, Under Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi w.r.t.  MCA letter 
no.- AV.13024/31/2013-AS dated 06/01/2014
